Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: We studied mutations in the GALNS gene from 23 additional MPS IVA patients ( 15 from Australia , 8 from Northern Ireland ) , with various clinical phenotypes ( severe , 16 cases ; intermediate , 4 cases ; mild , 3 cases ) .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| MPS IVA |

Explanation:

The paragraph mentions a study on patients with mutations in the GALNS gene, which is associated with Morquio A syndrome, also known as MPS IVA. This is the only disease mentioned in the paragraph, so the table contains one row with "MPS IVA" in the Disease column.
